title: Enjou Mate
sinopse:
Touma Yagami became a delinquent after distancing himself from his childhood friend, Atsushi Saitou, who wants to reconnect with him. The reason is something Touma could never reveal: he's actually in love with Atsushi. He ends up confessing on a whim, but Atsushi's answer is...?

(Source: MU)
